title: Bella Thorne flaunts nipple piercing on Snapchat
title_page: Bella Thorne flaunts nipple piercing on Snapchat | Daily Mail Online
text:
Bella Thorne flaunted her new nipple piercing while trying on casual clothes in New Orleans on Thursday.
The blue-haired 19-year-old - who boasts 31.5M social media followers - got the barbell body modification back on January 26 at Manhattan's West 4 Tattoo.
Perhaps the Boo! A Madea Halloween actress - who relies on stylist Brad Goreski - was simply Snapchatting an ordinary wardrobe fitting while on the set of Assassination Nation.

That same day, Bella's nepotistically-privilged castmate Maude Apatow shared a BTS snap taken Monday while filming the Sam Levinson's social media thriller.
In the 2017 movie - starring Joel McHale, Bill Skarsgård, and Hari Nef - Thorne plays a high school cheerleader, who's dating the quarterback (Cody Christian).
Meanwhile, the half-Cuban beauty's rumoured beau Chandler Parsons was in Tennessee with his Memphis Grizzlies prepping for their game against the Atlanta Hawks Saturday.

'She's very sexually free, and even encourages him to be with other women.'
